formulas.name: formula_myRule_29
formulas.expression: IsNew() && ( CONTAINS( TEXT ( {!myVariable_current.SBQQ__Opportunity__r.PrimarySource__c} ) , "Distributor" ) || CONTAINS( TEXT ( {!myVariable_current.SBQQ__Opportunity__r.SecondarySource__c}) , "Distributor" ) || CONTAINS( TEXT ( {!myVariable_current.SBQQ__Opportunity__r.TertiarySource__c} ) , "Distributor" ) )
